overview: The first episode is entitled One Love. Jackie is the campus queen, rich, beautiful and liked by everyone except Che, who thinks that Jackie is just a shallow brat. After being forced to work together for school activities, Jackie made it a personal goal for Che to like her.  Two Hearts is the second episode. Enzo is a star soccer player at school who loves the attention that he gets. However, he takes many things for granted, this changes when he gets a heart problem and doctors say that only a transplant can save his life.

production_companies.name: Star Cinema â€“ ABS-CBN Film Productions

tagline: Two love stories in one movie that will make you fall in-love like it's the first time!!!
title: My First Romance
